oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt 1 from oral history interview with George Boyles, 1987 October 27
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with George Boyles, conducted on 27 October 1987 by Mary Glenn Hearne. Boyles discusses the two-year debate among McKendree Methodist Church members over plans by church officials to build a high-rise office building over the church and an arcade leading up to the church door. The complete interview, as well as a partial index, is available in the repository.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Boyles, George Herbert, 1905-1997--Interviews
McKendree Methodist Church (Nashville, Tenn.)
